scripts.build: echo "[build] esbuild starting" && esbuild worker.js --bundle --format=esm --platform=browser --main-fields=browser,module,main --define:global=\"globalThis\" --outfile=dist/worker.mjs && node -e "const fs=require('fs');console.log('[build] output', fs.existsSync('dist/worker.mjs')?'OK':'MISSING', fs.existsSync('dist/worker.mjs')?fs.statSync('dist/worker.mjs').size:0,'bytes')"
